sentences.sentence: Do women who watch telenovelas have fewer babies (but more men)?
sentences.translation: 看肥皂剧的女性会有更少的小孩(但有更多男人)吗？

sentences.sentence: Typical telenovelas usually tell the story of a poor girl in love with a rich guy whose evil grandma doesn't approve of their romance.
sentences.translation: 通常肥皂剧的故事是这样：一个穷姑娘和一个富公子相爱，但公子的祖母横加阻挠。
